# air-user-profile
<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description | Type      | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `avatarSrc` | `avatar-src` |             | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `editable`  | `editable`   |             | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `userBio`   | `user-bio`   |             | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `userName`  | `user-name`  |             | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Dependencies

### Depends on

- [air-avatar](../basic-components/avatar)
- [air-text](../basic-components/text)
- [air-input](../basic-components/input)
- [air-button](../basic-components/button)

<air-previewer size="auto">

  >
    <div slot="title" class="custom-title">
      🔥 Custom Title: Super User
    </div>
    <div slot="content" class="custom-content">

    </div>
  </air-user-profile>
